short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tokyo Ghoul Chibi wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Tokyo Ghoul Chibi background. Tokyo Ghoul Chibi theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Each new tab displays a different Tokyo Ghoul Chibi wallpaper.
2. Switch up your Tokyo Ghoul Chibi background or pin your favorite in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google Search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media accounts.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New note feature to jot down your tasks.
7. Quick links to your frequently visited sites.
8. Bookmark your favorite pages for easy access.
9. Add websites to the Shortcut panel for faster navigation.
10. Immediate access to Google apps.
11. Explore more themes easily.
12. Simplified sharing to social platforms.
13. Download wallpapers directly from the new tab.
14. Play games with quick access links.
15. Activate interactive animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your new Tokyo Ghoul Chibi tab.
